On Thu, 2007-03-08 at 21:45 +0100, Julian Reschke wrote:
> So, at the end o=
f the day, where's the advantage over using WebDAV, 
> except for the probl=
em that WebDAV seems to suffer from an "not invented 
> here" image over he=
re?

WebDAV seems to solve a bigger problem.  I guess one could cherry pick=

the MOVE/MKREDIRECTREF methods, call it "webdav-friendly" or something
and=
 be done with it; I'm not sure what else that would pull in as
conceptual o=
r technical dependencies...

It's just often easier to re-write something t=
o solve the specific
problem at hand than it is to use an existing
technolo=
gy/spec/toolkit/&c.  Reminds me of the Robert Glass "fact" that
a 25% incre=
ase in problem complexity brings a 100% increase in solution
complexity.
